Gresham.Springdale School:
The Springdale School, now the Springdale Community Center, is a building located in Springdale, Oregon, United States on the National Register of Historic Places. The single-story, Art Deco-style building was designed by Claud Freeman and constructed in 1931 by Claude Woodle.


== History ==
Springdale School at the intersection of the historic highway and Bell Road also served as the Springdale Community Center.
